name: Hue to Danang Airport
description: Hue to Da Nang airport by private car is an useful service to enjoy the relaxation and comfort on the way from Hue to Da Nang airport. Phong Nha Private car is delighted to offer the high quality of private car transfer servicewith English speaking driver, free wifi and mineral water on car. The distance from Hue to Da Nang about 120km and it will take you about 3 hours of driving.
